misalignments.reasoning: Middleware protection for /dashboard routes completely missing - no middleware.ts file exists to check session cookies and redirect unauthenticated users
POST /api/auth/logout endpoint completely missing - logout directory exists but contains no route.ts implementation
Empty state message 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' completely missing - TaskList component has no conditional rendering for empty task arrays
Email validation function with regex /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/ completely missing - validation.ts contains no validateEmail function
Structured error response format completely missing - API returns { error: 'message' } instead of specified { error: { code: 'ERROR_CODE', message: 'Human-readable message' } } format
Database transactions using db.transaction() completely missing - bulk operations clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks do not wrap operations in transactions
